comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Her wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Princess_Adelheid_of_Saxe-Meiningen His wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prince_Adalbert_of_Prussia One of their granddaughters, a nurse named Marina Adelaide Emily Patterson Engel, died last year in Downey, California: royalmusingsblogspotcom.blogspot.com/2011/01/qvd-update-d... Their grandson, Marina's twin Berengar Patterson, also died in 2011, also in Southern California: royalmusingsblogspotcom.blogspot.com/2011/06/qvd-death-of... As far as I can tell, their granddaughter Dohna Patterson Pearl (b. 1954) is alive and living in the US.
